name: Head Start
description: Free preschool for low-income families with children 3-4
fullDescription: Head Start is a federally-funded program providing free, comprehensive early childhood education, health, nutrition, and family support services to low-income children and families.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free preschool education
- For children ages 3-4
- Comprehensive child development
- Health and nutrition services
- Family support programs
- Special needs support included
howToGetIt:
1. Check income eligibility requirements
2. Find local Head Start program
3. Complete application process
4. Provide income and family documentation
5. Participate in enrollment screening
6. Enroll child in program
keywords: Head Start, free preschool, ages 3-4, federal program, early childhood, low-income, nutrition, health services
